PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04602018-04-25,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActSpecial Import Measures Act
Canadian International Trade Tribunal Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Import Measures Regulations and the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL IMPORT MEASURES REGULATIONS AND THE CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL REGULATIONS in order to enable the full implementation of measures announced in Budget 2017 and to enhance the effectiveness and inclusiveness of Canada’s trade remedy system.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0088 Publication Date: 2018-05-16
